issue.title: [LCI] Implement the Mother Lode
issue.body:
Alright for this one I'm not sure of how many tokens should be created when there is no card discovered. 0 or 10?
Anyone got an opinion? I expect the per-card ruling will clarify that, but can implement one version before that, and it is easier to fix it later.

comment.body: uhm alright, I'll move the firing of the event at the end of the loop.

Explored event must fire after all explore actions done due rules:

> 701.40a Certain abilities instruct a permanent to explore. To do so, that permanent’s controller reveals the top card of their library. If a land card is revealed this way, that player puts that card into their hand. Otherwise, that player puts a +1/+1 counter on the exploring permanent and may put the revealed card into their graveyard.

> 701.40b A permanent “explores” after the process described in rule 701.40a is complete, even if some or all of those actions were impossible.

commits.message: [LCI] Implement Captain Storm, Plunderer of Cosmium

issue.title: [LCI] Implement the Mother Lode
issue.body:
Alright for this one I'm not sure of how many tokens should be created when there is no card discovered. 0 or 10?
Anyone got an opinion? I expect the per-card ruling will clarify that, but can implement one version before that, and it is easier to fix it later.

comment.body: I think we should do this where `DiscoverEffect` has a static method that handles discovering and then returns the card that was found so its attributes can be utilized rather than saving the card to the effect. In either case, I don't think we need to have a boolean that determines whether we save the card as we can just do it by default.

pull_request.title: WIP: Implement Craft mechanic
pull_request.body: The basic functionality is there but I still need to do cards that care about what was exiled which I haven't done yet.

issue.body:

comment.body:
**[Hit the Mother Lode](https://cards.scryfall.io/normal/front/e/7/e75f460c-43e2-4353-8b73-71ff8651a79d.jpg?1698172845)** - [(Gatherer)](undefined) [(Scryfall)](https://scryfall.com/card/lci/153/hit-the-mother-lode?utm_source=api) [(EDHREC)](https://edhrec.com/route/?cc=Hit+the+Mother+Lode)
> {4}{R}{R}{R}
> Sorcery
> Discover 10. If the discovered card's mana value is less than 10, create a number of tapped Treasure tokens equal to the difference. (To discover 10, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 10 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

issue.title: Unban Chaos Orb in Oldschool Formats
issue.body: With #11306 we have now a suitable implementation of Chaos Orb. Thus, the B&R lists of old-school formats should be updated. Chaos Orb is restricted in all of them.

commits.message: unban Chaos Orb from OId School formats (#11344)

issue.title: Unban Chaos Orb in Oldschool Formats
issue.body: With #11306 we have now a suitable implementation of Chaos Orb. Thus, the B&R lists of old-school formats should be updated. Chaos Orb is restricted in all of them.

comment.body: The issue is that ChaosOrb is banned in Constructed.java (which the OldSchool formats inherit). I'll unban them in the 5 OldSchool formats so they would be properly restricted.

issue.title: LCI - The Lost Caverns of Ixalan Set Card Implementation Tracking
issue.body:
This checklist is here to help manage the implementation of The Lost Caverns of Ixalan. If a card is marked as being in progress then someone is working on it.

If you're new to implementing cards then you likely don't have permission to check things off. This is totally fine! We still appreciate your contributions so just leave a comment to let us know that you're working on it.

Don't worry about moving things from in progress to completed either, there's a script that handles that, and don't worry about fixing text issues as those are usually handled when the set is done.

[All Sets](https://github.com/magefree/mage/wiki/Set-implementation-list)

# Unimplemented Cards

- [x] In progress -- [Abuelo, Ancestral Echo](https://scryfall.com/search?q=!abueloancestralecho)

comment.body: we're gonna want to pass in a target class that targets both permanents and cards in graveyards
